1: A song of the stairway, by King David What if God had not been on our side? Let all Israel admit this!
2-3: –3 What if God had not been there for us? Our enemies, in their violent anger, would have swallowed us up alive!
4-5: –5 The nations, with their flood of rage, would have swept us away and we would have drowned, perished beneath their torrent of terror!
6: We can praise God over and over that he never left us! God wouldn't allow the terror of our enemies to defeat us.
7: We are free from the hunter's trap; their snare is broken and we have escaped!
8: For the same God who made everything, our Creator and our mighty maker, he himself is our helper and defender!
